docs.snippet: A man suspected in the killings of two women in Florida and one in Alabama died from a self-inflicted gunshot wound after a standoff Tuesday at a Georgia motel in which a female suspect was arrested, authorities said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A man suspected in the killings of two women in Florida and one in Alabama died from a self-inflicted gunshot wound after a standoff Tuesday at a Georgia motel in which a female suspect was arrested, authorities said.

headline.main: Authorities: Suspect in 3 Slayings Dead After Motel Standoff

docs.snippet: German leader Angela Merkel urged Russia's Vladimir Putin in a telephone call on Tuesday to use his influence on separatists in eastern Ukraine to stop the violence there, and the two agreed on the need for new ceasefire efforts, a German governme...
docs.lead_paragraph: German leader Angela Merkel urged Russia's Vladimir Putin in a telephone call on Tuesday to use his influence on separatists in eastern Ukraine to stop the violence there, and the two agreed on the need for new ceasefire efforts, a German government spokesman said.

headline.main: Merkel Urges Putin to Help End Violence in Eastern Ukraine

docs.snippet: An Indonesian court postponed on Tuesday the hearing of a billion-dollar dispute between Goldman Sachs and a local tycoon by two weeks, granting him time to gather more evidence to prove a claim the U.S. bank's unit unlawfully sold shares he owned...
